header.title: Ireland Salary Calculator
header.subtitle: Calculate your take-home pay with accurate Irish tax calculations

intro.paragraph1: Irish tax calculations involve income tax, Universal Social Charge (USC), and Pay Related Social Insurance (PRSI). Our Ireland salary calculator helps you understand your net pay after all deductions.
intro.paragraph2: Enter your gross salary and tax details to get accurate calculations based on current Irish tax rates.
